vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Λυσίας, -ου, ὁ
Lysias (Claudius L., Act.23:26), Act.24:7, 22.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.23.26; also called Claudius at Act.23.26;
§ Lysias, (Proper name), Acts 23:26; 24:7, 22*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
呂西亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "釋放者"
古羅馬護民官, 古羅馬千人軍隊司令官, 千夫長 (徒 23:26, 24:27, 24:22)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
吕西亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "释放者"
古罗马护民官, 古罗马千人军队司令官, 千夫长 (徒 23:26, 24:27, 24:22)
